nodes.text: The cedar was a tree that could be found in the forests of the planet Chandrila. During a meeting between former Rebellion heroes Lando Calrissian, Han Solo, and Leia Organa in 7 ABY, the fresh smell of cedar and pine trees mixed with the scent of the droid BX-778's cooking within the apartment owned by Solo and Organa.
The cedar was mentioned in the 2018 novel Last Shot, written by Daniel José Older.
